description: Variation of condition 6 (opening hours) of planning permissions ref: P/1996/1150 dated 20/11/1996 and ref: PP/2014/0387 dated 21/02/2014 for "Erection of a single storey building for use as a McDonald's Drive-Thru restaurant together with details of external materials, parking, bin stores and access". Variation from 0700hrs to 0000hrs to 0600hrs to 0000hrs Monday to Sunday (1 addtional hour)
decision_conditions: The use hereby permitted shall not be open to customers outside the following times - 0600hrs to 0000hrs Monday to Sunday.  Reason: To protect the amenity of neighbouring properties, in accordance with Local Policy 7A of the Development Management Development Plan Document (2013); policies 7.13 and 7.15 of the London Plan(2011); and National Planning Policy Framework (2012).
